articles.content: Canadians have taken to drinking and smoking a lot more, and eating larger amounts of junk food as a fallout of the coronavirus crisis, according to a Government survey which has alarmed health autho… [+2452 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 recovery rate improves to 48.37 per cent; 1,19,293 people recover so far - All India Radio
articles.description: During the last 24 hours, a total of 5,220 COVID-19 patients have been cured in the country. So far, a total of 1,19,293 patients have been cured taking the recovery rate to 48.37 per cent.
